scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm-run-all cp-environment -p watch-css start-js
scripts.startDev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm-run-all cp-environment -p watch-css start-js
scripts.startLocal: cross-env NODE_ENV=local npm-run-all cp-environment -p watch-css start-js
scripts.startTest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm-run-all cp-environment -p watch-css start-js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm-run-all cp-environment build-css build-js
scripts.buildLocal: cross-env NODE_ENV=Local npm-run-all cp-environment build-css build-js
scripts.buildDev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm-run-all cp-environment build-css build-js
scripts.buildTest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm-run-all cp-environment build-css build-js
